title: Klondike Gold Rush - Seattle Unit National Historical Park: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia       Step back into the Klondike Gold Rush through photographs and descriptions of those who participated. More  Not sure how you pan for gold? How did a prospector in 1898 remove 40 feet of permafrost to reach a bedrock paystreak? What does gold look like?  Check back often as the multimedia content will continue to grow.
